trends.topic: Airbus A320 Solar-Radiation Data Corruption Risk Triggers Global Fleet Modifications and Flight Disruption Warnings
trends.reason: Airbus has disclosed that intense solar radiation can corrupt data critical for flight on A320-family aircraft and requested modifications to roughly 6,000 planes, prompting regulators and airlines to warn of potential flight disruptionsâ€”making this a major, time-sensitive safety and software-reliability incident affecting avionics systems worldwide.
